output.dependency: The values in the column representing flight routes (with airline and airports) correspond to values in the column representing departure times. Each route is associated with a specific departure time.
The values in the column representing flight routes (with airline and airports) correlate with the arrival times in another column, indicating that each route has a defined arrival time.
The departure times and arrival times have a temporal dependency, where each scheduled departure time corresponds directly to an arrival time for the respective flight.
